## Checklist

- [ ] Tests added/updated and passing (`pnpm turbo test`)
- [ ] Type checking passes (`pnpm turbo typecheck`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`pnpm turbo lint`)
- [ ] Test coverage meets 80% threshold
- [ ] Commit messages follow [conventional commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/) (`feat:`, `fix:`, `docs:`, etc.)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if applicable)
